divs: sighting detailsit was about 4:30 am on friday morning on october 10, 2008. i heard a loud nose that woke me up. a banging noise i associated as a car with a flat tire. my daughters also heard the noise and others in my neighborhood but they all went back to sleep. then i heard military jets flying very low. sounded something like the blue angels flying over my house. i got up and looked out the back door. it was cloudy but i thought i saw an oval shaped thing far up in the sky blinking around in a circle. multicolored, looked like a 1970's christmas tree topper. i went to get my glasses and looked back in the same place and it was gone. then over the tree tops i saw what looked like a flock of canadian geese flying over the tree tops. they had a blue glow around them and it seemed as if they had mirrored wings flapping. as they got closer i could see it was not birds. the thing was flying very low, and slowly, silent, just above the tree tops. i stared for a few seconds when i realized it was not birds it scared me so i shut the door. a few seconds later i opened the door again and it was hovering over my garage. about 20 feet away and about 100 (maybe 200) or so feet in the air above my garage. i am not good with estimating measurments but it was very close. i saw a lot of detail on this thing. it was about half an acre in size based on the lots in my neighborhhod. a hovering v-shaped warehouse. amazing. as it hovered, i felt as if it were showing off, like "hey i see you, look at me". it was incredible. beautiful. i stared for a good 5 minutes. awe struck with fear. i can describe this thing in good detail if anyone is interested. if this is some kind of aurora secret plane, our military thing, thy should be proud and tell the world. if our government made this thing, you should be proud. it was incredible. words can not describe what i saw. it was a v formation of lights flickering like mirrored birds. they was a triangle shaped platform above the orbs but they were not connected to it. it was completely silent as i remember but maybe a low hum or whirl noise. it was beautiful. heavenly. so bright i could barely look at it. i will never forget october 10, 2008 4:50 am as long as i am on this earth. i live about 2 city blocks from llyod expressway and about a half mile from i 164 on the eastside of evansville. this thing was flying to the southwest very slow and low. it looked like it would have came from chandler\newburgh area, flew over the east side, then maybe crossed old newburgh road after it left my house and went over the river in the direction of henderson. if anyone else saw something that looked liked blue glowing canada geese flying in formation or a v-shape object or a blue\gray triangle flying over i 164 or the lloyd expressway on friday oct. 10 4:30-4:50 am, please tell mufon. if anyone else in plaza meadows subdivision saw it, please tell mufon so i know. strange to think i am the only person who saw this. the neighbors i spoke to heard the loud bangs and the military jets but they did not look outside. please contact jerry sievers from vincennes mufon if you saw anything on friday october 10, 2008 about 4:30 am . thanks.
